channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s the Incentives, Stupid
item.description: From college kids with ‘disabilities’ to the Minnesota fraudsters, we see the results when society or government confers benefits on certain groups or...

item.title: China’s Threat to the World Economy
item.description: This week’s Chinese trade numbers can leave little doubt that the country’s trade surplus is unsustainable.

item.title: Doha Is the New Paris
item.description: Tucker Carlson finds an alluring alternative to the United States.

item.title: On Obamacare, Trump Already Showed Republicans the Way
item.description: Senate Republicans should quit trying to expand it.

item.title: Trump’s Ominous Decision to Sell Advanced Chips to China
item.description: The Nvidia deal could help China beat us in the AI race.

item.title: Trump's tariffs spur government's improving deficit
item.description: The deficit has ticked down in the new fiscal year, and analysts said there's one obvious reason for the improvement: President Trump's tariffs.

item.title: Trump hails American business environment for U.S. entrepeneurs
item.description: President Trump Wednesday exalted the business climate in the country at a roundtable gathering of top U.S. tech entrepreneurs at the White House, say...

item.title: FDA Head Makary Commits To Releasing ‘Robust’ Abortion Pill Review As Soon As It Is Completed
item.description: The FDA’s study, Makary announced, is even ‘bigger’ and ‘more robust’ than previous mifepristone examinations.

item.title: ‘Gold-Standard’ Immigration Enforcement Bill Lagging In Indiana As Redistricting Sucks Oxygen
item.description: While Indiana's congressional redistricting efforts generate massive attention, an immigration bill the Trump administration supports is lagging.

item.title: D.C. Appeals Court Upholds Trump’s Prohibition On ‘Trans’ Soldiers In The Military
item.description: In a major win for the Trump administration, a federal appellate court upheld the Pentagon’s prohibition on trans-identifying individuals from serving...

item.title: House passes defense bill to raise troop pay, speed weapons purchases
item.description: The House voted to pass a sweeping defense policy bill Wednesday that authorizes $900 billion in military programs, including a pay raise for troops a...

item.title: Documents: Wisconsin Judge In Trump Electors Case Didn’t Write His Own Ruling
item.description: Unsealed documents accuse retired Dane County Judge Frank Remington of ghostwriting Judge John Hyland's order rejecting a dismissal motion.

item.title: Trump administration adds militarized zone in California along southern U.S. border
item.description: The Trump administration is adding another militarized zone to the southern U.S. border to support border security operations - this time in Californi...

item.title: Campaign Finance And The First Amendment Take Center Stage At SCOTUS
item.description: In NRSC v. FEC, the court will decide the constitutionality of restrictions on coordinated spending between candidates and political parties.

item.title: Swing district House Republicans launch discharge petition to force vote on Obamacare subsidies
